-A PREROUTING -j prerouting_rule 
-A POSTROUTING -j delegate_postrouting

-A delegate_postrouting -j sslvpn_postrouting

:PREROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]

*mangle
:PREROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:POSTROUTING ACCEPT [0:0]
-A POSTROUTING -p tcp -m tcp --tcp-flags SYN,RST SYN -j TCPMSS --clamp-mss-to-pmtu 
COMMIT
# Completed on Thu Jul 12 18:41:44 2012
# Generated by iptables-save v1.4.10 on Thu Jul 12 18:41:44 2012
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:FORWARD DROP [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [0:0]
:MINIUPNPD - [0:0]
:accept_log - [0:0]
:confd - [0:0]
:content_filter - [0:0]
:delegate_forward - [0:0]
:delegate_input - [0:0]
:delegate_output - [0:0]
:dhcprelay - [0:0]
:dmzhost_forward - [0:0]
:drop_log - [0:0]
:firewall_disable - [0:0]
:hardwaredmz_mark - [0:0]
:forward_rule - [0:0]
:forward_vlan_defaults - [0:0]
:fwIgmpIn - [0:0]
:hardware_dmz - [0:0]
:captive_portal - [0:0]
:icmp_flood - [0:0]
:icmp_flood_rules - [0:0]
:igmp_fw_bypass - [0:0]
:input_rule - [0:0]
:input_wan_defaults - [0:0]
:inter_vlan_routing - [0:0]
:miniupnpd_rules - [0:0]
:policynat_output - [0:0]
:output_rule - [0:0]
:ping_of_death - [0:0]
:ping_of_death_rules - [0:0]
:port_trigger_fwd - [0:0]
:portforward - [0:0]
:rip_fw_bypass - [0:0]
:snmp - [0:0]
:sslvpn_forward - [0:0]
:sslvpn_input - [0:0]
:staticnat - [0:0]
:syn_flood - [0:0]
:syn_flood_rules - [0:0]
:udp_flood - [0:0]
:udp_flood_rules - [0:0]
:upnp_internal - [0:0]
:vpn_fw_bypass - [0:0]
:vpn_input_bypass - [0:0]
:vpn_output_bypass - [0:0]
:vpn_passthrough - [0:0]
:6in4tunnel - [0:0]
:policynat - [0:0]
:ssh - [0:0]
:device_management - [0:0]
-A INPUT -s 127.0.0.1 -d 127.0.0.1 -p tcp --dport 4565 -j confd
-A INPUT -j captive_portal 
-A INPUT -j icmp_flood 
-A INPUT -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT 
-A INPUT -m conntrack --ctstate INVALID -j DROP 
-A INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT 
-A INPUT -j syn_flood 
-A INPUT -j udp_flood 
-A INPUT -j ping_of_death 
-A INPUT -j device_management 
-A INPUT -j input_rule 
-A INPUT -j delegate_input 
-A INPUT -j firewall_disable 
-A INPUT -j input_wan_defaults 
-A FORWARD -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j content_filter 
-A FORWARD -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT 
-A FORWARD -p tcp -m tcp ! --tcp-flags FIN,SYN,RST,ACK SYN -m state --state NEW -j LOG --log-prefix "FIREWALL:PACKET DROP" 
-A FORWARD -p tcp -m tcp ! --tcp-flags FIN,SYN,RST,ACK SYN -m state --state NEW -j REJECT --reject-with tcp-reset 
-A FORWARD -m conntrack --ctstate INVALID -j DROP 
-A FORWARD -j hardwaredmz_mark
-A FORWARD -j forward_rule 
-A FORWARD -j igmp_fw_bypass
-A FORWARD -j policynat 
-A FORWARD -j portforward 
-A FORWARD -j port_trigger_fwd 
-A FORWARD -j staticnat 
-A FORWARD -j miniupnpd_rules 
-A FORWARD -j dmzhost_forward 
-A FORWARD -j delegate_forward 
-A FORWARD -j firewall_disable 
-A FORWARD -j forward_vlan_defaults 
-A OUTPUT -j policynat_output
-A OUTPUT -s 127.0.0.1 -d 127.0.0.1 -p tcp --dport 4565 -j confd
-A OUTPUT -m conntrack --ctstate RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT 
-A OUTPUT -m conntrack --ctstate INVALID -j DROP 
-A OUTPUT -o lo -j ACCEPT 
-A OUTPUT -j output_rule 
-A OUTPUT -j delegate_output 
-A OUTPUT -j firewall_disable 
-I confd -j ACCEPT 
-A INPUT -j DROP
-A accept_log -j LOG --log-prefix "FIREWALL ACCEPT:" --log-level 6 
-A accept_log -j ACCEPT 
-A delegate_forward -j vpn_passthrough 
-A delegate_forward -j vpn_fw_bypass 
-A delegate_forward -j inter_vlan_routing 
-A delegate_forward -j sslvpn_forward 
-A delegate_forward -j hardware_dmz 
-A delegate_input -p udp -m udp --dport 161 -j snmp 
-A delegate_input -j vpn_input_bypass 
-A delegate_input -j sslvpn_input 
-A delegate_input -m iprange --dst-range 224.0.0.0-239.255.255.255 -j fwIgmpIn 
-A delegate_input -j rip_fw_bypass 
-A delegate_input -j upnp_internal
-A delegate_input -j ssh 
-A delegate_input -j 6in4tunnel -p 41
-A delegate_input -p udp -m udp --dport 67 -j dhcprelay 
-A delegate_output -j vpn_output_bypass
-A dhcprelay -d 255.255.255.255 -i br-wan+ -j DROP
-A dhcprelay -d 255.255.255.255 -i eth0+ -j DROP
-A dhcprelay -d 255.255.255.255  -i ppoe-wan1+ -j DROP
-A dhcprelay -d 255.255.255.255 -i l2tp-wan1+ -j DROP
-A dhcprelay -d 255.255.255.255 -i pptp-wan1+ -j DROP
-A dhcprelay -d 255.255.255.255 -i 3g-usb+ -j DROP
-A dhcprelay -d 255.255.255.255 -i wwan+ -j DROP
-A dhcprelay -i br-wan+ -j ACCEPT
-A dhcprelay -i eth0+ -j ACCEPT 
-A dhcprelay -i ppoe-wan1+ -j ACCEPT 
-A dhcprelay -i l2tp-wan1+ -j ACCEPT 
-A dhcprelay -i pptp-wan1+ -j ACCEPT 
-A dhcprelay -i 3g-usb+ -j ACCEPT 
-A dhcprelay -i wwan+ -j ACCEPT 
-A 6in4tunnel -j ACCEPT
-A drop_log -j LOG --log-prefix "FIREWALL DROP:" --log-level 6 
-A drop_log -j DROP 
-A forward_vlan_defaults -i eth3.4094 -j DROP 
-A forward_vlan_defaults -i eth3+ -j ACCEPT 
-A forward_vlan_defaults -i br-vlan+ -j ACCEPT 
-A icmp_flood_rules -m limit --limit 100/sec --limit-burst 50 -j RETURN 
-A icmp_flood_rules -m limit --limit 1/sec -j LOG --log-prefix "FIREWALL ICMP-FLOOD:" 
-A icmp_flood_rules -j DROP 
-A input_wan_defaults -i br-wan+ -p tcp -m multiport --dports 80,443 -j ACCEPT
-A input_wan_defaults -i eth0+ -j DROP 
-A input_wan_defaults -i ppoe-wan1+ -j DROP 
-A input_wan_defaults -i l2tp-wan1+ -j DROP 
-A input_wan_defaults -i pptp-wan1+ -j DROP 
-A input_wan_defaults -i 3g-usb+ -j DROP 
-A input_wan_defaults -i wwan+ -j DROP 
-A ping_of_death_rules -m length --length 60:65535 -j RETURN
-A ping_of_death_rules -m limit --limit 1/sec -j LOG --log-prefix "FIREWALL PING OF DEATH Detected:"
-A ping_of_death_rules -j DROP 
-A rip_fw_bypass -i br-wan+ -p udp -m udp --sport 520 --dport 520 -j ACCEPT
-A rip_fw_bypass -i eth0+ -p udp -m udp --sport 520 --dport 520 -j ACCEPT 
-A rip_fw_bypass -i ppoe-wan1+ -p udp -m udp --sport 520 --dport 520 -j ACCEPT 
-A rip_fw_bypass -i l2tp-wan1+ -p udp -m udp --sport 520 --dport 520 -j ACCEPT 
-A rip_fw_bypass -i pptp-wan1+ -p udp -m udp --sport 520 --dport 520 -j ACCEPT 
-A rip_fw_bypass -i 3g-usb+ -p udp -m udp --sport 520 --dport 520 -j ACCEPT 
-A rip_fw_bypass -i wwan+ -p udp -m udp --sport 520 --dport 520 -j ACCEPT 
-A syn_flood_rules -m limit --limit 128/sec --limit-burst 50 -j RETURN 
-A syn_flood_rules -m limit --limit 1/sec -j LOG --log-prefix "FIREWALL SYN-FLOOD:" 
-A syn_flood_rules -j DROP 
-A udp_flood_rules -p udp -m limit --limit 1000/sec --limit-burst 50 -j RETURN 
-A udp_flood_rules -m limit --limit 1/sec -j LOG --log-prefix "FIREWALL UDP-FLOOD:" 
-A udp_flood_rules -j DROP 
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface eth0+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface eth2+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface br-vlan+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface eth3+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface ppp+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface l2tp+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface ppoe+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface pptp+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface 3g-usb+ --jump DROP
-A ssh -p tcp --dport 22 --in-interface wwan+ --jump DROP
COMMIT
